titles.title: To terminate the Paul S. Sarbanes Transit in Parks Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 2/16/2011--Introduced. Repeals the Paul S. Sarbanes Transit in Parks Program.
